articles.title: Man kisses his wife while bathing in Ayodhya's Saryu, gets thrashed
articles.description: A man was thrashed by a group of people in an apparent instance of moral policing when he was bathing with his wife in the Saryu river in Ayodhya in Uttar Pradesh.
